name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a proficient Backend Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in leveraging **Python**, **Django**, and **RESTful APIs** to design high-performance backend solutions. My technical arsenal includes cloud infrastructure expertise in **AWS** and **Azure**, as well as strong abilities in **SQL** and **ORMs** for efficient database management. I have hands-on experience with **Celery** for task management and utilize monitoring tools such as **Datadog**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch** for system performance insights. I prioritize code quality through rigorous unit testing and performance profiling strategies. Additionally, I provide technical mentorship and practice pair programming to foster a collaborative development environment. My career is marked by a commitment to writing scalable, secure code while adhering to industry best practices.
